p: The As concentrations with a range of 0.5–18.3 mg.kg −1 have an average of 6.9 ± 8.9 mg.kg −1 (Table 2). The mean value of As in the baseline soil is 3.5 ± 1.1 mg.kg −1. As shown in Table 2, the mean value of the As in the Ahvaz urban soil samples is much lower than those stated from many large and/or industrialised cities as reported in Table ( 3).
